00026 #include <fstream>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <string>
00029 
00030 #include "Global.h"
00031 
00038 void 
00039 CreateAHFParameterFile( unsigned isnap ){
00040   writedebug(DEBUG," * Creating AHFstep parameter file...");
00041   std::ofstream fout;
00042   fout.open ( (Folder("parameters") + "parameters_AHF_" + Snaps(isnap)).c_str(), std::ios_base::out );
00043   fout << Folder("snaps") << Snaps(isnap) 
00044        << " "
00045        << "60" //file type, here GADGET(2), single file
00046        << " "
00047        << "1"  //number of CPUs used to read in data
00048        << std::endl
00049        << "ahf_out_" << std::endl
00050        << "8"  // base grid (1dimensional)
00051        << std::endl
00052        << "4"  // refinement criterion on base grid
00053        << std::endl
00054        << "4"  // refinement criterion on refined grid
00055        << std::endl
00056        << "0" <<std::endl
00057        << "0" <<std::endl
00058        << "0" <<std::endl
00059        << "0" <<std::endl;
00060   fout.close();
00061   donedebug(DEBUG);
00062 }
00063 
00070 void 
00071 RunAHFstep( unsigned isnap ){
00072   writelndebug(DEBUG, " * Running AHFstep..." );
00073   std::string now = "AHFstep " + Folder("parameters") + "parameters_AHF_" + Snaps(isnap);
00074   std::cout << now << std::endl;
00075   RunCommand( now );
00076   donedebug(DEBUG);
00077 }
00078 
00085 void 
00086 MoveAHFout(unsigned isnap){
00087   writedebug(DEBUG, " * Moving output files...");
00088   std::string now;
00089   std::string ahfout = Folder( "output" ) + Snaps(isnap) + "/";
00090   now = "mkdir -p " + ahfout;
00091   RunCommand(now);
00092   now = "mv ahf_out_* " + ahfout;
00093   RunCommand(now);
00094   donedebug(DEBUG);
00095 }
00096 
00103 void 
00104 RenameAHFout(unsigned isnap){
00105   writedebug(DEBUG, " * Renaming output files...");
00106   std::string now = "";
00107   std::string ahfout = Folder( "output" ) + Snaps(isnap) + "/";
00108 
00109   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*particles " + ahfout + "ahf_out_particles";
00110   RunCommand(now);
00111   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*halos " + ahfout  + "ahf_out_halos";
00112   RunCommand(now);
00113   //  now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*mass " + ahfout + "ahf_out_mass";
00114   //  RunCommand(now);
00115   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*profiles " + ahfout + "ahf_out_profiles";
00116   RunCommand(now);
00117   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*substructure " + ahfout + "ahf_out_substructure";
00118   RunCommand(now);
00119   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*centres " + ahfout + "ahf_out_centres";
00120   RunCommand(now);
00121   now = "tail -n+2 " + ahfout + "ahf_out_halos > " + ahfout  + "ahf_out_halos2";
00122   RunCommand(now);
00123 
00124   donedebug(DEBUG);
00125 }
00126 
00138 void 
00139 AHFrun( unsigned isnap ){
00140 
00141   CreateAHFParameterFile(isnap);
00142 
00143   RunAHFstep(isnap);
00144 
00145   MoveAHFout(isnap);
00146   RenameAHFout(isnap);
00147 }
